entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure warnings reported from Helix job are included in AzDO job #60512
  • IIncrementalGenerator is not incremental? #60504
  • Add Ability to Embed netmodules #60503

Closed

  • Avoid checking array/stackalloc creation syntax in NullableWalker #60376
    17.3
  • Improving The Hot Reload Feature #57724
    17.2
  • Struct ': this()' initializers should not have definite assignment errors #58790
    Compiler.Next
  • InlineHints `SuppressForParametersThatMatchMethodIntent` does not match local functions #60145
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjusting section nesting #60517
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60515
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactoring: Switch from passing compilation as a parameter to using new ConversionsBase.Compilation property instead. #60513
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Merge compiler features into main-vs-deps #60510
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support parsing for Unsigned Right Shift operator #60501
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Introduce a better system for keeping track if a buffer is visible or not in tagging #60500
    Area-IDE
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • WIP Pause taggers2 #60497
    Area-IDE
  • Add integration test to flag MEF composition breaks #60496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1693428 #60495
    auto-merge
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Enable NRT in AbstractSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider #60492
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Document ROSLYN_TEST_USEDASSEMBLIES #60478
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Build official builds of dev17.1 branch #60516
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [17.0 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60483
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60514
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add an aggregate logger for inheritance margin #60493
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move StackTraceAnalyzer over to VirtualCharSequence #60404
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Publish blame heap dumps for new integration tests #60487
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Zero fields before running field initializers in struct constructor with default `: this()` initializer #60471
  • Inline Hints: look for methodkind.localfunction when checking method intent #60486
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main-vs-deps #60431
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Run 17.0 integration tests against the Release VS instead of Preview #59136
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60508
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update Spanish queue to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #60506
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update Spanish queue to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #60507
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify how we handle event change notifications in tagging #60488
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Change project-cone-sync to not dump projects outside of the cone. #60465
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Modify semanticTokens `isFinalized` logic #60484
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-needs-work
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Use provider type name for CodeAction telemetry for code actions... #60480
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix binder chain for nameof scopes #60459
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for yield return to CompleteStatementCommandHandler #59683
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60482
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
